content: ends of yarn ribbing *k1-tbl p1 repeat from * to end simple texture stitch pattern one color round 1 *k3 p1 repeat from * to end rounds 2 3 4 knit round 5 k1 p1 *k3 p1 repeat from * ending with k2 rounds 6 7 8 knit simple texture stitch pattern with stripes once the desired number of stripes have been added knit the remainder of the hat with mc yarn with ac yarn round 1 *k3 p1 repeat from * to end round 2 knit with mc yarn round 3 knit with ac yarn round 4 knit round 5 k1 p1 *k3 p1 repeat from * ending with k2 round 6 knit with mc yarn round 7 knit with ac yarn if stripes will continue into next repetition otherwise use mc yarn round 8 knit 2 crown decrease transfer all stitches to double pointed needles when necessary round 1 *k6 ssk repeat from * to end 49 56 63 stitches remain round 2 knit round 3 *k5 ssk repeat from * to end 42 48 54 stitches remain round 4 knit round 5 *k4 ssk repeat from * to end 35 40 45 stitches remain round 6 knit round 7 *k3 ssk repeat from * to end 28 32 36 stitches remain round 8 knit round 9 *k2 ssk repeat from * to end 21 24 27 stitches remain round 10 knit round 11 *k1 ssk repeat from * to end 14 16 18 stitches remain round 12 *ssk repeat from * to end 7 8 9 stitches remain 3
